description.originalText: I wanted to take a moment to acknowledge what an amazing caregiver Jineen is to my mom. She goes above and beyond, always anticipating my mom‘s needs. She keeps my mom engaged and motivated both physically and mentally. Jineen even helps with my dad whenever needed, and is a great comfort to him as well. Jineen is always prompt and helps with anything that is asked of her including cleaning, cooking and running errands when needed. She is always ready and willing to help. When Jineen is with my mom and dad, I am confident that they are in excellent hands and that gives our family great peace of mind knowing she is there with them! I would highly recommend Jineen to care for your loved one!

Whenever one is considering hiring a care giver for a loved one, there is always the concern of whether they will care for them like we have. When my parents became incapable of living independently, our family considered a care facility. They tried it for two months, and found they were very unhappy and wanted to go home and have a caregiver. We’ve had a few over the years, but as fate would have it, Jineen raised the bar to the level of family. In other words, she cared for both my mother and father with the love, empathy and care as if my folks were hers. In fact, I think they had come to feel Jineen was part of our family. In the beginning, it started as an 8 hour day and as they struggled with various illnesses (kidney disease with my father, dementia with my mother) Jineen transitioned to being their 24 hour caregiver, five days a week with relief on the other two days. From food preparation to doctor’s appointment to medication management, Jineen did it all, always keeping records and updating us on all developments. Jineen is a unique individual; smart, knowledgeable about the variety of medical issues and is very skilled on how to navigate our health care system. We were very lucky and blessed to have her in our lives and we will always be a part of hers.

description.displayText: Jineen went above and beyond with my mom. She was so nice, knowledgeable, professional, and overall provided such a relief. She helped my mom do some light exercise and created goals for her to help during her recovery. My mom is in good care with Jineen and I am able to handle the other important matters.
description.originalText: Jineen went above and beyond with my mom. She was so nice, knowledgeable, professional, and overall provided such a relief. She helped my mom do some light exercise and created goals for her to help during her recovery. My mom is in good care with Jineen and I am able to handle the other important matters.

description.displayText: Jineen was an outstanding aide for my mother. She was my mother's aid for over 7 years. She anticipated my mother's needs most of the time - so before my mother would ask for something Jineen was there with what my mother wanted. She did an excellent job of communicating with us what was happening & if there were any changes in my mother's situation. Even though my sister & I spoke to my mother just about every day & I usually visited my mother 4-5 days a week, there were things going on that Jineen was able to tell us about that we had not noticed. My mother loved Jineen, as did my sister & the rest of our family - including me. We postponed getting a 24 hour aide for several months because we didn't want to lose Jineen (Jineen was not a 24 hour aide). When we eventually got a 24 hour aide Jineen did an excellent job of training her in what my mothers needs were & also how to do certain things my mother's way. She also wrote a detailed instruction booklet for the new aide.

description.displayText: When I hired Jineen to care for my elderly father of 93 years of age ,and told her his daily needs ,she understood his needs and the families, he immediately liked her attitude and compassion. Hes doing better now thanks to Jineen, I'd hire her again with no hesitation for my fathers medical attention,  shes always on time sometimes even earlier. Shes a very excellent caregiver for any circumstances.

Shes a very excellent caregiver for any circumstances.

description.displayText: Jineen works around my work schedule and is very personable. She adjusts to my husband's many requests and seems to know how to handle his personality, as well as, listens to feedback.  She takes it upon herself to help around the house, beyond the caregiving. She is always early and even though I only need her for short shifts right now, she works hard during that time.
description.originalText: Jineen works around my work schedule and is very personable. She adjusts to my husband's many requests and seems to know how to handle his personality, as well as, listens to feedback.  She takes it upon herself to help around the house, beyond the caregiving. description.displayText: I had knee surgery.  Jineen is  good at bathing those with mobility issues.  I was impressed that Jineen checked shower and hot and cold water supply to ensure I did not get burned. She made sure floor was dry and not slippery.  Jineen provided wonderful bathing assistance and personal care. She is a kind spirit.  Nice to have around. She is both careful and hard working.
